Class BoardRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardRow

  • public class BoardRow
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds instances of the BoardNodes and creates virtual row on the board. Simulates moving and fighting between Plants and Zombies in current row.
    Version:
    24 October, 2018
    Author:
    Dmytro Sytnik (VanArman), Ahmed Romih (decarbonite)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<BoardNode> nodes 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardRow()
      Default constructor initializes a row of a board

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addPlant(int index, Plant newPlant)
      Adds Plant object to the specific position
      protected void addZombie(int index, Zombie newZombie)
      Adds Zombie object to the specific position
      protected int fightPvsZ(int score)
      Simulates fighting between Plant and Zombie
      protected int generateMoney(int money)
      Money generator if on row contains MoneyFlower with 50% chance to gain money
      java.util.ArrayList<BoardNode> getRow()
      Return array of nodes that contain
      protected boolean hasPlant(int index)
      Check if the Plant exists in a specific position
      protected boolean hasZombie(int index)
      Check if the Zombie exists in a specific position
      protected void moveZombie()
      Moves zombies across plane (based on the number of node(s)) Assign ZOMBIE_WON to true if zombie stays on the first node (end of the board) and this node does not contain plant.

        Returns:
